MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Hightown, Middlewich Road, Bradwall Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required following third party damage to our network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.33PM on 28th October 2020.
